markdown:
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 28 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23 [Ardissa Prendergant](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1766) **Source** [Pathfinder #175: Broken Tusk Moon](/Sources.aspx?ID=112) pg. 39 **Perception** +9 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +9, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +9, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +9, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +9, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +7 **Str** +0 **Dex** +2 **Con** +1 **Int** +4 **Wis** +2 **Cha** +0 **Items** [Heavy Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=70) (20 bolts), [Rapier](/Weapons.aspx?ID=36) (bonded item), [_scroll of fireball_](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [_scrolls of magic missile_](/Spells.aspx?ID=180) (2), [spellbook](/Equipment.aspx?ID=53) --- **AC** 18 **Fort** +6 **Ref** +9 **Will** +11 **HP** 45 **Mesmerizing Sigil** ([arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61)) **Trigger** A creature targets Ardissa with a melee Strike; **Effect** Ardissa traces a dizzying symbol in the air. The creature must attempt a DC 20 Will save. The creature is then temporarily immune for 1 minute.
**Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Failure** Until the beginning of her next turn, Ardissa is [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) from the creature.
**Critical Failure** Until the end of her next turn, Ardissa is [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) from the creature. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** rapier +11 ([deadly d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 1d6 piercing **Ranged** heavy crossbow +11 ([range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 2](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 1d10 piercing **Arcane Prepared Spells** DC 20, attack +12 - **Cantrips (2nd)** [Dancing Lights](/Spells.aspx?ID=58), [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Ray of Frost](/Spells.aspx?ID=245), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280) - **1st** [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180) (×2), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244), [True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345) - **2nd** [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180), [Obscuring Mist](/Spells.aspx?ID=210), [Summon Animal](/Spells.aspx?ID=316) **Wizard School Spell** DC 20, 1 Focus Point - **2nd** [Hand of the Apprentice](/Spells.aspx?ID=530) **Drain Bonded Item** ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11)) **Frequency** twice per day; **Effect** Ardissa regains the ability to cast one spell she has already cast. She must still Cast the Spell normally. She can use this ability once to recover a 1st-level spell and once to recover a 2nd-level spell. She typically uses this ability to recover her [_magic missile_](/Spells.aspx?ID=180) spells
name: Ardissa Prendergant

The creature must attempt a DC 20 Will save. The creature is then temporarily immune for 1 minute. Success The creature is unaffected. Failure Until the beginning of her next turn, Ardissa is concealed from the creature. Critical Failure Until the end of her next turn, Ardissa is hidden from the creature. --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action rapier +11 (deadly d8, Disarm, Finesse), Damage 1d6 piercing Ranged Single Action heavy crossbow +11 (range increment 120 feet, reload 2), Damage 1d10 piercing Arcane Prepared Spells DC 20, attack +12 - Cantrips (2nd) Dancing Lights, Daze, Mage Hand, Ray of Frost, Shield - 1st Magic Missile (×2), Ray of Enfeeblement, True Strike - 2nd Magic Missile, Obscuring Mist, Summon Animal Wizard School Spell DC 20, 1 Focus Point - 2nd Hand of the Apprentice Drain Bonded Item Free Action (Arcane) Frequency twice per day; Effect Ardissa regains the ability to cast one spell she has already cast.
